headline: Assessing Paycom Software’s Valuation After Years of Share Price Weakness
summary: Wondering if Paycom Software is finally starting to look like value after a rough few years in the market? In this article, we walk through whether the current share price fairly reflects the business behind the ticker. Despite a long slide over the last 3 and 5 years, with the stock still down heavily from its highs, recent moves have been more muted. The share price has moved 0.7% over the last month and the shares are still down 20.4% year to date. Recent headlines have focused less on...
